text: The Hungarian Grand Prix () is a Grand Prix where Formula One races take place. == Winners of the Hungarian Grand Prix == ===Repeat winners (drivers)=== Drivers in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Driver Years won 8 Lewis Hamilton 2007, 2009, 2012, 2013, 2016, 2018, 2019, 2020 4 Michael Schumacher 1994, 1998, 2001, 2004 3 Ayrton Senna 1988, 1991, 1992 2 Nelson Piquet 1986, 1987 Damon Hill 1993, 1995 Jacques Villeneuve 1996, 1997 Mika Häkkinen 1999, 2000 Jenson Button 2006, 2011 Sebastian Vettel 2015, 2017 ===Repeat winners (constructors)=== Teams in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Constructor Years won 11 McLaren 1988, 1991, 1992, 1999, 2000, 2005, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2011, 2012 7 Williams 1986, 1987, 1990, 1993, 1995, 1996, 1997 Ferrari 1989, 1998, 2001, 2002, 2004, 2015, 2017 5 Mercedes 2013, 2016, 2018, 2019, 2020 2 Red Bull Racing 2010, 2014 ===Repeat winners (engine manufacturers)=== Manufacturers in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Manufacturer Years won 13 Mercedes * 1999, 2000, 2005, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2016, 2018, 2019, 2020 8 Renault 1990, 1993, 1995, 1996, 1997, 2003, 2010, 2014 7 Ferrari 1989, 1998, 2001, 2002, 2004, 2015, 2017 6 Honda 1986, 1987, 1988, 1991, 1992, 2006 * Between 1999 and 2005 built by Ilmor, funded by Mercedes ===Year by year=== A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship.
